answers.answer: Im soooo over it lol lucky u I have 7 weeks left lol im in soooo much pain it a crazy.  Excited to see my baby girl soon tho. ")

Omg your so lucky.! But hope you have a safe labor soon.Tmrw I'll be 30weeks, so countdown begins Tmrw lol. 10 more weeks to meet my little man. I've been experiencing bad pelvic pain where it hurts to walk or lay down. Even my tailbone & back hurts. Every night i get bad heart burns & acid reflux. I haven't been able to sleep. Ya I'm just ready for march to be here lol. The last trimester are the hardest at the end
I have yet to experience pain other than the pressure of his head I have 5 weeks left & I can't wait to hold him in my arms!!! Good luck ladies (=

I'm on my 4th child and he is a killer, lol... I have 3 girls already and I must say it was so sweet carrying them:)... This is the first time I've ever felt pregnant... I didn't have pregnancy symptoms with them... The only thing I wanted was potatoes... But besides that I was good... This boy right here has made me sleep most of my life away, gave me morning sickness w\the sickness, made me eat thing I don't normally eat and so far I've gained 66lbs... And I'm only 28w3d

I have less than 7 weeks left and am so excited to have my baby boy in my arms but just need to do a lot b4 he gets here seems like time is flying I've just experienced back pain hip pain and fatigue this trimester I just wanna sleep ! Lol

I'll be 30w on Saturday. My only symptoms are the horrid acid reflux that I get from anything and everything! An my back killing me at night but im getting used to that lolAlso today I found out I failed my 1hr glucose test :( hoping I don't fail the 3hr cuz the thought of GD an a humongous baby resulting in a Csection scares me to death!
47 days to go!!! And nothing but heartburn.

I'll be 30w on Saturday. My only symptoms are the horrid acid reflux that I get from anything and everything! An my back killing me at night but im getting used to that lolAlso today I found out I failed my 1hr glucose test :( hoping I don't fail the 3hr cuz the thought of GD an a humongous baby resulting in a Csection scares me to death!

My due date is in 10 days, but I'm in the hospital right now. I had to be induced because I have preeclampsia. Plus my poor princess couldn't pass her nst. Thankfully, I have been contracting since Sunday and I think I was in early labor before they stated the medicine. I just wish I could eat then sleep. :(
6 days left...... ugh. In pain. Contractions suck. Lol

question: Hey ladies so just wanted to know how all of you are doing? What kind of symptoms are you having? How much longer do you have left! All of us are so close already! I cannot wait to hold my daughter plus like none of my clothes fit lol! I have tailbone/back pains, swollen all over, and fatigue is starting to kick in ): I'll be 37 weeks tomorrow which makes it only 2 weeks left until I'm done!
title: 3rd trimester mommas!
